content.newsInsight: China just purged more military leaders overseeing nuclear forces and everyone's debating Xi's power consolidation. Wrong focus. When you clean house in your nuclear command while building the world's fastest growing arsenal, you're not paranoid. You're pivoting.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: China's military nuclear purges, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: if you're Xi and you know something about nuclear readiness we don't, do you fire the old guard or promote them?
